Text: "The One" is a song by American R&B recording artist Tamar Braxton.
Triplets:<Tamar Braxton
1:
--------------------
Text: The One (Tamar Braxton song):  Written by Braxton, Yung Berg, Shaunice Lasha Jones, LaShawn Daniels, and its producer K.E. on the Track, the song contains samples from Juicy Fruit by Mtume.
Triplets:<The One
2:
--------------------
Text: The One (Tamar Braxton song):  The song also contains re-sung lyrics from The Notorious B.I.G.'s "Juicy", which also sampled Juicy Fruit.
